contenido:
The public is invited to attend the Sunday session of the "Nights of Champagne and Tropical Fish" at the Miami Beach Convention Center to celebrate the finest in drink and marine life. Highlighting the evening's activities will be the mega-auction of rare bottles of champagne and exotic species of freshwater fish, some in alluring combinations.

"Saturday night was invitation-only, Sunday is open to the public," reports Arthur Swordane, operations manager of the show for its sponsor, Global Ways importers. "We pair a Veuve Clicquot Grand Dame Rose with a large Jardini Arowana right off the bat on Sunday... watch for it."

Saturday night festivities brought out such notables as socialite Luella Vedric and musician r'Bert, who were special guests of Global Ways owner Madhi Kim. It is said both are looking to add to their current tropical fish collections, as well as their wine cellars.
